name: Easy Math (for Kids)
description:
Overview A small little game made to introduce the basic principles of math. This program is made for kids to give them a tool to learn with and adjust current needs. Features Easy Math features 5 different settings to challenge yourself. You can choose between getting following tasks:
  • Additions
  • Subtractions
  • Multiplications
  • Divisions
  • Hard Mode (includes negative numbers)
